Generation V.Black: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.
Generation V.White: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
Generation V.Black 2: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
Generation V.White 2: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

Generation VI.X: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
Generation VI.Y: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

Generation VIII.Sword: There's a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.
Generation VIII.Shield: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.
